description:
Nagumo is invited to a dinner party at a stately old mansion... where a mass murder once took place.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: L’Affaire du meurtre de la maison hurlante/Maki et le Conflit de générations
Murder at the Mansion of Screams / Maki-chan and the Generation Gap
Zekkyoukan Satsujin Jiken / Maki-chan to Generation Gap
絶叫館殺人事件 / マキちゃんとジェネレーションギャップ
